##### FILE: dashboard_10.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kubernetes-dashboard/Deployment/kubernetes-dashboard:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: kubernetes-dashboard
  name: kubernetes-dashboard
  namespace: kubernetes-dashboard
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: kubernetes-dashboard
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: kubernetes-dashboard
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --namespace=kubernetes-dashboard
        - --insecure-bind-address=0.0.0.0
        image: kubernetesui/dashboard:v2.7.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 9090
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          timeoutSeconds: 30
        name: kubernetes-dashboard
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9090
          protocol: TCP
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsGroup: 2001
          runAsUser: 1001
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmp-volume
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      securityContext:
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: kubernetes-dashboard
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmp-volume

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource kubernetes-dashboard/Deployment/kubernetes-dashboard
policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource kubernetes-dashboard/Deployment/kubernetes-dashboard failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource kubernetes-dashboard/Deployment/kubernetes-dashboard failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource kubernetes-dashboard/Deployment/kubernetes-dashboard failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource kubernetes-dashboard/Deployment/kubernetes-dashboard failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource kubernetes-dashboard/Deployment/kubernetes-dashboard failed:
1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/

##### FILE: dashboard_12.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kubernetes-dashboard/Deployment/dashboard-metrics-scraper:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: dashboard-metrics-scraper
  name: dashboard-metrics-scraper
  namespace: kubernetes-dashboard
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: dashboard-metrics-scraper
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: dashboard-metrics-scraper
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: kubernetesui/metrics-scraper:v1.0.9
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8000
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          timeoutSeconds: 30
        name: dashboard-metrics-scraper
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          protocol: TCP
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsGroup: 2001
          runAsUser: 1001
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmp-volume
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      securityContext:
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: kubernetes-dashboard
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmp-volume

---

1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

##### FILE: dashboard_6.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kubernetes-dashboard/Role/kubernetes-dashboard:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: Role
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: kubernetes-dashboard
  name: kubernetes-dashboard
  namespace: kubernetes-dashboard
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - ""
  resourceNames:
  - kubernetes-dashboard-key-holder
  - kubernetes-dashboard-certs
  - kubernetes-dashboard-csrf
  resources:
  - secrets
  verbs:
  - get
  - update
  - delete
- apiGroups:
  - ""
  resourceNames:
  - kubernetes-dashboard-settings
  resources:
  - configmaps
  verbs:
  - get
  - update
- apiGroups:
  - ""
  resourceNames:
  - heapster
  - dashboard-metrics-scraper
  resources:
  - services
  verbs:
  - proxy
- apiGroups:
  - ""
  resourceNames:
  - heapster
  - 'http:heapster:'
  - 'https:heapster:'
  - dashboard-metrics-scraper
  - http:dashboard-metrics-scraper
  resources:
  - services/proxy
  verbs:
  - get

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

##### FILE: dashboard_datasources.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Secret/grafana-datasources:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Secret
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: grafana
    app.kubernetes.io/name: grafana
  name: grafana-datasources
  namespace: monitoring
stringData:
  datasources.yaml: |-
    {
        "apiVersion": 1,
        "datasources": [
            {
                "access": "proxy",
                "editable": false,
                "name": "prometheus",
                "orgId": 1,
                "type": "prometheus",
                "url": "http://prometheus.prometheus.svc:9090",
                "version": 1
            }
        ]
    }
type: Opaque

---

##### FILE: dashboard_editor_role.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ClusterRole/dashboard-editor-role:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: rbac
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: homer-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: dashboard-editor-role
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: clusterrole
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: homer-operator
  name: dashboard-editor-role
  namespace: default
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - homer.rajsingh.info
  resources:
  - dashboards
  verbs:
  - create
  - delete
  - get
  - list
  - patch
  - update
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - homer.rajsingh.info
  resources:
  - dashboards/status
  verbs:
  - get

---

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns

    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""

  name: allow-dns
  namespace: kubernetes-dashboard

      protocol: UDP

          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: kubernetes-dashboard

    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

##### FILE: dashboard7_11.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kubernetes-dashboard/Deployment/kubernetes-dashboard:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: kubernetes-dashboard
  name: kubernetes-dashboard
  namespace: kubernetes-dashboard
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: kubernetes-dashboard
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: kubernetes-dashboard
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --auto-generate-certificates
        - --namespace=kubernetes-dashboard
        image: kubernetesui/dashboard:v2.6.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8443
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          timeoutSeconds: 30
        name: kubernetes-dashboard
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          protocol: TCP
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsGroup: 2001
          runAsUser: 1001
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /certs
          name: kubernetes-dashboard-certs
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmp-volume
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      securityContext:
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: kubernetes-dashboard
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master
      volumes:
      - name: kubernetes-dashboard-certs
        secret:
          secretName: kubernetes-dashboard-certs
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmp-volume

---

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10

        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8000
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          timeoutSeconds: 30

        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          protocol: TCP

          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true

          runAsUser: 1001

          name: tmp-volume

        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      securityContext:
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: kubernetes-dashboard
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmp-volume

kind: Role

  - kubernetes-dashboard-csrf

  - secrets
  verbs:
  - get
  - update
  - delete

  - ""
  resourceNames:
  - kubernetes-dashboard-settings
  resources:
  - configmaps
  verbs:
  - get
  - update
- apiGroups:
  - ""
  resourceNames:
  - heapster
  - dashboard-metrics-scraper
  resources:
  - services
  verbs:
  - proxy
- apiGroups:
  - ""
  resourceNames:
  - heapster
  - 'http:heapster:'
  - 'https:heapster:'
  - dashboard-metrics-scraper
  - http:dashboard-metrics-scraper
  resources:
  - services/proxy
  verbs:
  - get

##### FILE: data_digest_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/digest:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: digest
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: digest
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          value: postgrespassword
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          value: twitty
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          value: postgresuser
        - name: DB_URL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: url

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/data-api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: data-api
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: data-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: data-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGODB_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: user
              name: cosmos-db-secret
        - name: MONGODB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: pwd
              name: cosmos-db-secret
        - name: APPINSIGHTS_INSTRUMENTATIONKEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: appinsights
              name: cosmos-db-secret
        image: replaceme-acr.azurecr.io/hackfest/data-api:2.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 3009
        name: data-api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3009
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 3009
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
      restartPolicy: Always

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to voting-app/StatefulSet/db-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: voting-app
    type: db
  name: db-deployment
  namespace: voting-app
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: voting-app
      type: db
  serviceName: postgresql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: voting-app
        type: db
      name: db-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_NAME
              name: db-config
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_USER_NAME
              name: db-config
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_PASSWORD
              name: db-config
        image: postgres:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: postgresql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: db-volume
      priorityClassName: db-priority
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: db-volume
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 100M

---

##### FILE: database10_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/db:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: db
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: psql
  serviceName: database
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        prometheus.io/port: "9187"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: psql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: database
              name: db
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: db
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: db
        - name: PGDATA
          value: /var/lib/postgresql/data/pgdata
        image: postgres:16.8
        livenessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: psql
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: psql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
          name: psql
        readinessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: psql
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "2"
            memory: 2048Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 1024Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: persistent-storage
      - env:
        - name: DATA_SOURCE_URI_FILE
          value: /var/run/datasource_uri/uri
        - name: DATA_SOURCE_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: db
        - name: DATA_SOURCE_PASS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: db
        image: quay.io/prometheuscommunity/postgres-exporter
        name: psql-exporter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9187
          name: metrics
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/datasource_uri
          name: ds-uri
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - echo "127.0.0.1:5432/${POSTGRES_DB}?sslmode=disable" > /data/uri
        env:
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: database
              name: db
        image: busybox:1.37
        name: generate-datasource-uri
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: ds-uri
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: ds-uri
      - name: persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: db-storage-claim
  updateStrategy:
    type: RollingUpdate

---

##### FILE: database10_4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/CronJob/postgres-backup:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: postgres-backup
  namespace: default
spec:
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - command:
            - sh
            - -c
            - |
              set -e

              mkdir -p /backup/${POSTGRES_DB}
              pg_dump -U ${POSTGRES_USER} -h ${POSTGRES_HOST} ${POSTGRES_DB} > /backup/${POSTGRES_DB}/backup_$(date +%!Y(MISSING)%!m(MISSING)%!d(MISSING)%!H(MISSING)%!M(MISSING)%!S(MISSING)).sql

              # Retain last 7 backups
              ls -t /backup/${POSTGRES_DB}/backup_*.sql | tail -n +8 | xargs -r rm
            env:
            - name: POSTGRES_DB
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  key: database
                  name: db
            - name: POSTGRES_USER
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  key: username
                  name: db
            - name: PGPASSWORD
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  key: password
                  name: db
            - name: POSTGRES_HOST
              value: db.paperless-ngx.svc
            image: postgres:16.8
            name: postgres-backup
            securityContext:
              allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
              readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
            volumeMounts:
            - mountPath: /backup
              name: storage
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
          volumes:
          - name: storage
            nfs:
              path: /mnt/tank/Server Backups/db-dumps
              readOnly: false
              server: woodlandpark.brickyard.whitestar.systems
  schedule: 0 2,14 * * *

---

  namespace: quiz

  replicas: 1

    matchLabels:
      app: mongo

        app: mongo

        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:

      volumes:

          claimName: mongo-pvc

        app: postgres

              name: database-secret-config
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: database-secret-config

          valueFrom:

##### FILE: database11_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/db:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: db
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: psql
  serviceName: database
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        prometheus.io/port: "9187"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: psql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: database
              name: db
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: db
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: db
        - name: PGDATA
          value: /var/lib/postgresql/data/pgdata
        image: postgres:16.8
        livenessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: psql
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: psql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
          name: psql
        readinessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: psql
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "2"
            memory: 2048Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 1024Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: persistent-storage
      - env:
        - name: DATA_SOURCE_URI_FILE
          value: /var/run/datasource_uri/uri
        - name: DATA_SOURCE_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: db
        - name: DATA_SOURCE_PASS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: db
        image: quay.io/prometheuscommunity/postgres-exporter
        name: psql-exporter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9187
          name: metrics
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/datasource_uri
          name: ds-uri
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - echo "127.0.0.1:5432/${POSTGRES_DB}?sslmode=disable" > /data/uri
        env:
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: database
              name: db
        image: busybox:1.37
        name: generate-datasource-uri
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: ds-uri
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: ds-uri
      - name: persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: db-storage-claim
  updateStrategy:
    type: RollingUpdate

---

##### FILE: database11_4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/CronJob/postgres-backup:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: postgres-backup
  namespace: default
spec:
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - command:
            - sh
            - -c
            - |
              set -e

              mkdir -p /backup/${POSTGRES_DB}
              pg_dump -U ${POSTGRES_USER} -h ${POSTGRES_HOST} ${POSTGRES_DB} > /backup/${POSTGRES_DB}/backup_$(date +%!Y(MISSING)%!m(MISSING)%!d(MISSING)%!H(MISSING)%!M(MISSING)%!S(MISSING)).sql

              # Retain last 7 backups
              ls -t /backup/${POSTGRES_DB}/backup_*.sql | tail -n +8 | xargs -r rm
            env:
            - name: POSTGRES_DB
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  key: database
                  name: db
            - name: POSTGRES_USER
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  key: username
                  name: db
            - name: PGPASSWORD
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  key: password
                  name: db
            - name: POSTGRES_HOST
              value: db.zitadel.svc
            image: postgres:16.8
            name: postgres-backup
            securityContext:
              allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
              readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
            volumeMounts:
            - mountPath: /backup
              name: storage
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
          volumes:
          - name: storage
            nfs:
              path: /mnt/tank/Server Backups/db-dumps
              readOnly: false
              server: woodlandpark.brickyard.whitestar.systems
  schedule: 0 2,14 * * *

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/postgres:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: database
  name: postgres
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: database
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: database
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          value: postgres
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          value: postgres
        image: postgres
        name: postgres
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
          name: sqlscript
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: pg-init-script
        name: sqlscript

##### FILE: database115.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/db:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert
    kompose.version: 1.22.0 (955b78124)
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: db
  name: db
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: db
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert
        kompose.version: 1.22.0 (955b78124)
      labels:
        io.kompose.service: db
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: MYSQL_DATABASE
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: MYSQL_USER
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          value: MYSQL_RANDOM_ROOT_PASSWORD
        - name: MYSQL_RANDOM_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: "1"
        image: mysql:latest
        name: mysql-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-data
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /mnt/mysql-data
        name: mysql-data

---

      - image: isjustintime/cd12355-db:0.0.1

          name: postgresdb
      volumes:
      - name: postgresdb

##### FILE: database124_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ${namespace}/StatefulSet/${stackname}-database-ss:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: ${stackname}-database
  name: ${stackname}-database-ss
  namespace: ${namespace}
spec:
  persistentVolumeClaimRetentionPolicy:
    whenDeleted: Delete
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ${stackname}-database
  serviceName: ${stackname}-database
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: ${stackname}-database
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: ${stackname}-database-secret
        image: ${database_image}
        name: ${stackname}-database
        ports:
        - containerPort: ${database_port}
          name: database-port
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - psql
            - -h
            - localhost
            - -U
            - ${database_user}
            - -c
            - SELECT 1
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1000Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql
          name: database-data
      hostname: ${stackname}-database
      restartPolicy: Always
  updateStrategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: database-data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteMany
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 2Gi
      storageClassName: ${storage_class}

---

##### FILE: database13_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to exam/StatefulSet/mysql-statefulset:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mysql-statefulset
  namespace: exam
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  serviceName: mysql-service
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: testdb
        image: mysql:latest
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - cat
            - /tmp/healthy
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: db-port
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - cat
            - /tmp/healthy
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 5
        startupProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - touch
            - /tmp/healthy
          failureThreshold: 30
          periodSeconds: 5
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-data
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mysql-data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

---

##### FILE: database14_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to exam/StatefulSet/mysql-statefulset:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mysql-statefulset
  namespace: exam
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  serviceName: mysql-service
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: testdb
        image: mysql:latest
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - cat
            - /tmp/healthy
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: db-port
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - cat
            - /tmp/healthy
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 5
        startupProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - touch
            - /tmp/healthy
          failureThreshold: 30
          periodSeconds: 5
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-data
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mysql-data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

---

##### FILE: database15_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to exam/StatefulSet/mini-projet-mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mini-projet
  name: mini-projet-mysql
  namespace: exam
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mini-projet
      tier: mysql
  serviceName: mini-projet-mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mini-projet
        tier: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-secrets
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: name
              name: mysql-configmap
        image: mysql:8.0
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.3"
            memory: 400Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.2"
            memory: 200Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      labels:
        app: mini-projet
        tier: mysql
      name: mysql-persistent-storage
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 250Mi
      storageClassName: standard

        environment: test
        run: sqlserver

          value: true
        - name: SA_PASSWORD
          value: Teste@123

        name: database
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/opt/mssql
          name: sql-data
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: sql-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: sql-pvc

##### FILE: database210_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to k8s-ns/StatefulSet/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql
  name: mysql
  namespace: k8s-ns
spec:
  replicas: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  serviceName: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchLabels:
                app: nginx
            topologyKey: topology.kubernetes.io/zone
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchLabels:
                app: mysql
            topologyKey: topology.kubernetes.io/zone
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: passwd
              name: mysql-passwd
        - name: MYSQL_CONFIGURATION
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: cnf
              name: mysql-config
        image: mysql:latest
        name: database
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: sql

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource k8s-ns/StatefulSet/mysql

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource k8s-ns/StatefulSet/mysql

##### FILE: database24_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: root-password
              name: ghost-db
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: ghost
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: ghost-db
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: ghost-db
        image: mysql:9.2.0
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "2"
            memory: 2048Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 1024Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

---

##### FILE: database24_4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/CronJob/mysql-backup:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: mysql-backup
  namespace: default
spec:
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - command:
            - sh
            - -c
            - |
              mkdir -p /backup/${MYSQL_DATABASE}
              mysqldump --user="root" --host="${MYSQL_HOST}" --password="${MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD}" "${MYSQL_DATABASE}" > /backup/${MYSQL_DATABASE}/backup_$(date +%!Y(MISSING)%!m(MISSING)%!d(MISSING)%!H(MISSING)%!M(MISSING)%!S(MISSING)).sql

              # Retain last 7 backups
              ls -t /backup/${MYSQL_DATABASE}/backup_*.sql | tail -n +8 | xargs -r rm
            env:
            - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
              value: ghost
            - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  key: root-password
                  name: ghost-db
            - name: MYSQL_HOST
              value: mysql.blog.svc
            image: mysql:9.2.0
            name: mysql-backup
            securityContext:
              allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
              readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
            volumeMounts:
            - mountPath: /backup
              name: storage
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
          volumes:
          - name: storage
            nfs:
              path: /mnt/tank/Server Backups/db-dumps
              readOnly: false
              server: woodlandpark.brickyard.whitestar.systems
  schedule: 0 2,14 * * *

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: database25_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/db:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: db
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: psql
  serviceName: database
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        prometheus.io/port: "9187"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: psql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: database
              name: db
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: db
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: db
        - name: PGDATA
          value: /var/lib/postgresql/data/pgdata
        image: postgres:16.8
        livenessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: psql
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: psql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
          name: psql
        readinessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: psql
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "2"
            memory: 2048Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 1024Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: persistent-storage
      - env:
        - name: DATA_SOURCE_URI_FILE
          value: /var/run/datasource_uri/uri
        - name: DATA_SOURCE_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: db
        - name: DATA_SOURCE_PASS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: db
        image: quay.io/prometheuscommunity/postgres-exporter
        name: psql-exporter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9187
          name: metrics
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/datasource_uri
          name: ds-uri
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - echo "127.0.0.1:5432/${POSTGRES_DB}?sslmode=disable" > /data/uri
        env:
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: database
              name: db
        image: busybox:1.37
        name: generate-datasource-uri
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: ds-uri
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: ds-uri
      - name: persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: db-storage-claim
  updateStrategy:
    type: RollingUpdate

---

##### FILE: database25_4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/CronJob/postgres-backup:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: postgres-backup
  namespace: default
spec:
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - command:
            - sh
            - -c
            - |
              set -e

              mkdir -p /backup/${POSTGRES_DB}
              pg_dump -U ${POSTGRES_USER} -h ${POSTGRES_HOST} ${POSTGRES_DB} > /backup/${POSTGRES_DB}/backup_$(date +%!Y(MISSING)%!m(MISSING)%!d(MISSING)%!H(MISSING)%!M(MISSING)%!S(MISSING)).sql

              # Retain last 7 backups
              ls -t /backup/${POSTGRES_DB}/backup_*.sql | tail -n +8 | xargs -r rm
            env:
            - name: POSTGRES_DB
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  key: database
                  name: db
            - name: POSTGRES_USER
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  key: username
                  name: db
            - name: PGPASSWORD
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  key: password
                  name: db
            - name: POSTGRES_HOST
              value: db.netbox.svc
            image: postgres:16.8
            name: postgres-backup
            securityContext:
              allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
              readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
            volumeMounts:
            - mountPath: /backup
              name: storage
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
          volumes:
          - name: storage
            nfs:
              path: /mnt/tank/Server Backups/db-dumps
              readOnly: false
              server: woodlandpark.brickyard.whitestar.systems
  schedule: 0 2,14 * * *

      app: psql
  serviceName: database
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        prometheus.io/port: "9187"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: psql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: database
              name: db
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: db
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: db
        - name: PGDATA
          value: /var/lib/postgresql/data/pgdata
        image: postgres:16.8
        livenessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: psql
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: psql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
          name: psql
        readinessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: psql
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "2"
            memory: 2048Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 1024Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: persistent-storage
      - env:
        - name: DATA_SOURCE_URI_FILE
          value: /var/run/datasource_uri/uri
        - name: DATA_SOURCE_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: db
        - name: DATA_SOURCE_PASS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: db
        image: quay.io/prometheuscommunity/postgres-exporter
        name: psql-exporter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9187
          name: metrics
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/datasource_uri
          name: ds-uri
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - echo "127.0.0.1:5432/${POSTGRES_DB}?sslmode=disable" > /data/uri
        env:
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: database
              name: db
        image: busybox:1.37
        name: generate-datasource-uri
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: ds-uri
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: ds-uri
      - name: persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: db-storage-claim
  updateStrategy:
    type: RollingUpdate

---

##### FILE: database26_4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/CronJob/postgres-backup:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: postgres-backup
  namespace: default
spec:
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - command:
            - sh
            - -c
            - |
              set -e

              mkdir -p /backup/${POSTGRES_DB}
              pg_dump -U ${POSTGRES_USER} -h ${POSTGRES_HOST} ${POSTGRES_DB} > /backup/${POSTGRES_DB}/backup_$(date +%!Y(MISSING)%!m(MISSING)%!d(MISSING)%!H(MISSING)%!M(MISSING)%!S(MISSING)).sql

              # Retain last 7 backups
              ls -t /backup/${POSTGRES_DB}/backup_*.sql | tail -n +8 | xargs -r rm
            env:
            - name: POSTGRES_DB
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  key: database
                  name: db
            - name: POSTGRES_USER
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  key: username
                  name: db
            - name: PGPASSWORD
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  key: password
                  name: db
            - name: POSTGRES_HOST
              value: db.paperless-ngx.svc
            image: postgres:16.8
            name: postgres-backup
            securityContext:
              allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
              readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
            volumeMounts:
            - mountPath: /backup
              name: storage
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
          volumes:
          - name: storage
            nfs:
              path: /mnt/tank/Server Backups/db-dumps
              readOnly: false
              server: woodlandpark.brickyard.whitestar.systems
  schedule: 0 2,14 * * *

---

##### FILE: database29_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to exam/StatefulSet/mysql-statefulset:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mysql-statefulset
  namespace: exam
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  serviceName: mysql-service
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: testdb
        image: mysql:latest
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - cat
            - /tmp/healthy
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: db-port
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - cat
            - /tmp/healthy
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 5
        startupProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - touch
            - /tmp/healthy
          failureThreshold: 30
          periodSeconds: 5
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-data
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mysql-data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

---

            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: testdb
        image: mysql:latest
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - cat
            - /tmp/healthy
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: db-port
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - cat
            - /tmp/healthy
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 5
        startupProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - touch
            - /tmp/healthy
          failureThreshold: 30
          periodSeconds: 5
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-data
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mysql-data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

---

        app: mini-projet
        tier: mysql

          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-secrets
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: name
              name: mysql-configmap

        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.3"
            memory: 400Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.2"
            memory: 200Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage

        app: mini-projet
        tier: mysql
      name: mysql-persistent-storage
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:

          storage: 250Mi
      storageClassName: standard

kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mariadb
    version: v1
  name: mariadb-statefulset
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mariadb
  serviceName: ejbca-database-service
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mariadb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MARIADB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mariadb-root-password
              name: mariadb-secret
        - name: MARIADB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: ejbca-db-password
              name: ejbca-mariadb-secret
        - name: MARIADB_DATABASE
          value: ejbca
        - name: MARIADB_USER
          value: ejbca
        image: mariadb:latest
        name: mariadb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: datadir
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: datadir
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 10G

---

          value: Teste@123

      restartPolicy: Always

##### FILE: database60.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/postgres:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: postgres
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: postgres
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: postgres
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: dbname
              name: database-secret-config
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: database-secret-config
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: database-secret-config
        image: postgres:9.6.5
        name: postgres
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432

---

##### FILE: database61.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to infra/Deployment/sqlserver:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: sqlserver
  namespace: infra
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      run: sqlserver
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        app: dev-store
        environment: test
        run: sqlserver
        tier: database
      name: database
      namespace: infra
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ACCEPT_EULA
          value: true
        - name: SA_PASSWORD
          value: Teste@123
        image: mcr.microsoft.com/mssql/server:2017-latest
        name: database
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/opt/mssql
          name: sql-data
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: sql-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: sql-pvc

---

##### FILE: database68_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/postgres:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: database
  name: postgres
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: database
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: database
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          value: postgres
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          value: postgres
        image: postgres
        name: postgres
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
          name: sqlscript
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: pg-init-script
        name: sqlscript

---

##### FILE: database72_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/database:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: database
  name: database
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: database
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: database
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: abdou1307/database
        name: database

        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment

  name: mysql
  namespace: default

    matchLabels:

    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: root-password
              name: ghost-db
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: ghost
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: ghost-db
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: ghost-db
        image: mysql:9.2.0
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "2"
            memory: 2048Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 1024Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

##### FILE: database8_4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/CronJob/mysql-backup:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: mysql-backup
  namespace: default
spec:
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - command:
            - sh
            - -c
            - |
              mkdir -p /backup/${MYSQL_DATABASE}
              mysqldump --user="root" --host="${MYSQL_HOST}" --password="${MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD}" "${MYSQL_DATABASE}" > /backup/${MYSQL_DATABASE}/backup_$(date +%!Y(MISSING)%!m(MISSING)%!d(MISSING)%!H(MISSING)%!M(MISSING)%!S(MISSING)).sql

              # Retain last 7 backups
              ls -t /backup/${MYSQL_DATABASE}/backup_*.sql | tail -n +8 | xargs -r rm
            env:
            - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
              value: ghost
            - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  key: root-password
                  name: ghost-db
            - name: MYSQL_HOST
              value: mysql.blog.svc
            image: mysql:9.2.0
            name: mysql-backup
            securityContext:
              allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
              readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
            volumeMounts:
            - mountPath: /backup
              name: storage
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
          volumes:
          - name: storage
            nfs:
              path: /mnt/tank/Server Backups/db-dumps
              readOnly: false
              server: woodlandpark.brickyard.whitestar.systems
  schedule: 0 2,14 * * *

---

##### FILE: database81_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to k8s-ns/StatefulSet/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql
  name: mysql
  namespace: k8s-ns
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  serviceName: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: optimised
                operator: In
                values:
                - memory
        podAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchLabels:
                  app: mysql
              topologyKey: topology.kubernetes.io/zone
            weight: 100
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: passwd
              name: mysql-passwd
        - name: MYSQL_CONFIGURATION
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: cnf
              name: mysql-config
        image: mysql:latest
        name: database
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: sql

---

kind: StatefulSet

  labels:
    app: sql
  name: sql
  namespace: k8s-ns
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: sql
  serviceName: sql

      labels:
        app: sql
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchLabels:
                app: web
            topologyKey: topology.kubernetes.io/zone
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchLabels:
                app: sql
            topologyKey: topology.kubernetes.io/zone

      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: passwd

          valueFrom:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/postgresql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: postgresql
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: postgresql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: postgresql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_NAME
              name: db-env
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_USERNAME
              name: db-env
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DB_PASSWORD
              name: db-secret
        image: postgres:latest
        name: postgresql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: postgresql-storage
      volumes:
      - name: postgresql-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: postgresql-pvc

##### FILE: database89_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/postgres:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  pg_hba.conf: |
    # TYPE  DATABASE        USER            ADDRESS                 METHOD
    host     replication     replicationuser         0.0.0.0/0        md5
    # "local" is for Unix domain socket connections only
    local   all             all                                     trust
    # IPv4 local connections:
    host    all             all             127.0.0.1/32            trust
    # IPv6 local connections:
    host    all             all             ::1/128                 trust
    # Allow replication connections from localhost, by a user with the
    # replication privilege.
    local   replication     all                                     trust
    host    replication     all             127.0.0.1/32            trust
    host    replication     all             ::1/128                 trust

    host all all all scram-sha-256
  postgresql.conf: "data_directory = '/data/pgdata'\nhba_file = '/config/pg_hba.conf'\nident_file
    = '/config/pg_ident.conf'\n\nport = 5432\nlisten_addresses = '*'\nmax_connections
    = 100\nshared_buffers = 128MB\ndynamic_shared_memory_type = posix\nmax_wal_size
    = 1GB\nmin_wal_size = 80MB\nlog_timezone = 'Etc/UTC'\ndatestyle = 'iso, mdy'\ntimezone
    = 'Etc/UTC'\n\n#locale settings\nlc_messages = 'en_US.utf8'\t\t\t# locale for
    system error message\nlc_monetary = 'en_US.utf8'\t\t\t# locale for monetary formatting\nlc_numeric
    = 'en_US.utf8'\t\t\t# locale for number formatting\nlc_time = 'en_US.utf8'\t\t\t\t#
    locale for time formatting\n\ndefault_text_search_config = 'pg_catalog.english'\n\n#replication\nwal_level
    = replica\narchive_mode = on\narchive_command = 'test ! -f /data/archive/%!f(MISSING) &&
    cp %!p(MISSING) /data/archive/%!f(MISSING)'\nmax_wal_senders = 3\n"
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: postgres
  namespace: default

---

##### FILE: database89_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/postgres:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: postgres
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: postgres
  serviceName: postgres
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: postgres
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - config_file=/config/postgresql.conf
        env:
        - name: PGDATA
          value: /data/pgdata
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_USER
              name: postgresql
              optional: false
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
              name: postgresql
              optional: false
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_DB
              name: postgresql
              optional: false
        image: postgres:15.0
        name: postgres
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
          name: database
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config
          readOnly: false
        - mountPath: /data
          name: data
          readOnly: false
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - |
          #create archive directory
          mkdir -p /data/archive && chown -R 999:999 /data/archive
        command:
        - bash
        - -c
        image: postgres:15.0
        name: init
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: data
          readOnly: false
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 493
          name: postgres
        name: config
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 100Mi
      storageClassName: standard

---

##### FILE: database9_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/db:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: db
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: psql
  serviceName: database
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        prometheus.io/port: "9187"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: psql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: database
              name: db
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: db
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: db
        - name: PGDATA
          value: /var/lib/postgresql/data/pgdata
        image: postgres:16.8
        livenessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: psql
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: psql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
          name: psql
        readinessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: psql
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "2"
            memory: 2048Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 1024Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: persistent-storage
      - env:
        - name: DATA_SOURCE_URI_FILE
          value: /var/run/datasource_uri/uri
        - name: DATA_SOURCE_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: db
        - name: DATA_SOURCE_PASS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: db
        image: quay.io/prometheuscommunity/postgres-exporter
        name: psql-exporter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9187
          name: metrics
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/datasource_uri
          name: ds-uri
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - echo "127.0.0.1:5432/${POSTGRES_DB}?sslmode=disable" > /data/uri
        env:
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: database
              name: db
        image: busybox:1.37
        name: generate-datasource-uri
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: ds-uri
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: ds-uri
      - name: persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: db-storage-claim
  updateStrategy:
    type: RollingUpdate

---

##### FILE: database9_4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/CronJob/postgres-backup:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: postgres-backup
  namespace: default
spec:
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - command:
            - sh
            - -c
            - |
              set -e

              mkdir -p /backup/${POSTGRES_DB}
              pg_dump -U ${POSTGRES_USER} -h ${POSTGRES_HOST} ${POSTGRES_DB} > /backup/${POSTGRES_DB}/backup_$(date +%!Y(MISSING)%!m(MISSING)%!d(MISSING)%!H(MISSING)%!M(MISSING)%!S(MISSING)).sql

              # Retain last 7 backups
              ls -t /backup/${POSTGRES_DB}/backup_*.sql | tail -n +8 | xargs -r rm
            env:
            - name: POSTGRES_DB
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  key: database
                  name: db
            - name: POSTGRES_USER
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  key: username
                  name: db
            - name: PGPASSWORD
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  key: password
                  name: db
            - name: POSTGRES_HOST
              value: db.netbox.svc
            image: postgres:16.8
            name: postgres-backup
            securityContext:
              allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
              readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
            volumeMounts:
            - mountPath: /backup
              name: storage
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
          volumes:
          - name: storage
            nfs:
              path: /mnt/tank/Server Backups/db-dumps
              readOnly: false
              server: woodlandpark.brickyard.whitestar.systems
  schedule: 0 2,14 * * *

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to learning/StatefulSet/sql:

kind: StatefulSet
metadata:

    app: sql
  name: sql
  namespace: learning
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: sql
  serviceName: sql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: sql
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchLabels:
                app: web
            topologyKey: topology.kubernetes.io/zone
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchLabels:
                app: sql
            topologyKey: topology.kubernetes.io/zone
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MARIADB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: passwd
              name: sql-passwd
        - name: MARIADB_CONFIGURATION
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: cnf
              name: sql-config

  labels:

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""

##### FILE: database-deploy_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/postdb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: postdb
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: postdb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: postdb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo:latest
        name: postdb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.2"
            memory: 256Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/postdb
          name: postdb-data
      volumes:
      - name: postdb-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: postdb-pvc

---

    metadata:
      labels:
        app: postgres

      containers:
      - env:

          value: mydatabase
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          value: myuser
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          value: mypassword
        image: postgres:16.1-alpine3.19
        name: postgres
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432

##### FILE: databaseDeployment_2.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/db-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: database
  name: db-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: database
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: database
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_USERNAME
          value: postgres
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          value: management
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: dbpassword
              name: secret-db
        image: postgres
        name: database
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432

---

##### FILE: database-deployment1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/database:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert -f docker-compose.yml
    kompose.version: 1.32.0 (765fde254)
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: database
  name: database
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: database
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert -f docker-compose.yml
        kompose.version: 1.32.0 (765fde254)
      labels:
        io.kompose.network/php81fpmwordpressmysql830-wp-net: "true"
        io.kompose.service: database
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --default-authentication-plugin=mysql_native_password
        env:
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: wordpress-db
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          value: changeme
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: changeme
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: wp-user
        image: mysql:latest
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          hostPort: 3306
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: db-data
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: db-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: db-data

---

    app: db-deployment
  name: db-deployment
  namespace: vote

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: db-deployment-pod
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: db-deployment-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_HOST_AUTH_METHOD
          value: trust
        image: postgres:9.4
        name: postgres
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: db-data
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: db-data

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/database-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: database-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      component: database
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        component: database
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: database-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: question_board
        image: fhsinchy/question-board-database
        name: database
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: database-storage
          subPath: question-board
      volumes:
      - name: database-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: database-persistent-volume-claim

---

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert
    kompose.version: 1.32.0 (HEAD)
  labels:
    app: database
  name: database-deployment
  namespace: v-ics
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: database
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: database
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --log_bin_trust_function_creators=1
        env:
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: scadalts
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: user-password
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: root-password
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: DB_HOST
          value: database-service
        image: mysql/mysql-server:8.0.32
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-data
        - mountPath: /etc/mysql
          name: mysql-config
          readOnly: true
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-data-pvc
      - name: mysql-config
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-config-pvc
