kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: postgres-db-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: postgres-db
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: postgres-db
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: postgres-config
        image: postgres:10.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: postgres-db
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: postgres-volume
      volumes:
      - name: postgres-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: postgres-pv-claim

##### FILE: database-kubegres-operator_11.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kubegres-system/Deployment/kubegres-controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: kubegres
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kubegres
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: kubegres-controller-manager
  namespace: kubegres-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.14.1
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: reactivetechio/kubegres:1.17
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: kubegres-controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

##### FILE: database-service-deployment_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/fashionme-db:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: fashionme-db
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: fashionme-db
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: fashionme-db
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: jayanisathukorala/fashionme-db:latest
        name: fashionme-db
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: shared-storage
          subPath: db-data
      volumes:
      - name: shared-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: postgres-pvc

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/fashionme-db

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/eodhp-website-database:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: eodhp-website-database
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: eodhp-website-database
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: eodhp-website-database
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          value: website_db
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          value: admin
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
              name: website-database-password
        image: postgres:latest
        name: postgres
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgres
          name: postgres-persistent-storage
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: postgres-persistent-storage
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi
      storageClassName: standard

---

##### FILE: database-sts.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/database-sts:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: kubernetes-poc
    name: database-deploy
  name: database-sts
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: kubernetes-poc
      name: database-po
  serviceName: mysql-server-h
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: kubernetes-poc
        name: database-po
      name: database-po
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database.user
              name: app-config
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: database.password
              name: app-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database.name
              name: app-config
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: database.root.password
              name: app-secret
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_HOST
          value: '%!'(MISSING)
        image: mysql/mysql-server:8.0.32-1.2.11-server
        name: mysql-server
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: database-persistent-storage
      hostname: mysql-pod
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - rm -f /var/lib/mysql/mysql.sock*
        image: busybox
        name: init-mysql-socket
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: database-persistent-storage
      subdomain: mysql-server-h
      volumes:
      - name: database-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: database-pvc

---

##### FILE: DataBookkeeping_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to foxden/Deployment/dbs:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: dbs
  name: dbs
  namespace: foxden
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: dbs
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/path: /metrics
        prometheus.io/port: "8310"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: dbs
        env: k8s
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /data/srv
        env:
        - name: FOXDEN_CONFIG
          value: /etc/secrets/.foxden.yaml
        image: ghcr.io/chesscomputing/databookkeeping:v0.0.3-test2
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Accept
              value: application/json
            path: /apis
            port: 8310
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: dbs
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8310
          name: foxden
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 8000m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 100Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/secrets
          name: secrets
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - name: secrets
        secret:
          secretName: foxden-secrets

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert -f docker-compose.yaml
    kompose.version: 1.32.0 (765fde254)
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: data
  name: data
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: data
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert -f docker-compose.yaml
        kompose.version: 1.32.0 (765fde254)
      labels:
        io.kompose.network/app-myapp: "true"
        io.kompose.service: data
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ALLOW_EMPTY_PASSWORD
          value: "yes"
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: mydatabase
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          value: root
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: root
        image: notyouraverageusername/data:v1
        name: db
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          hostPort: 3306
          protocol: TCP
      restartPolicy: Always

##### FILE: DataDiscovery_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to foxden/Deployment/discovery:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: discovery
  name: discovery
  namespace: foxden
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: discovery
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/path: /metrics
        prometheus.io/port: "8320"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: discovery
        env: k8s
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /data/srv
        env:
        - name: FOXDEN_CONFIG
          value: /etc/secrets/.foxden.yaml
        image: ghcr.io/chesscomputing/datadiscovery:v0.0.3-test2
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Accept
              value: application/json
            path: /apis
            port: 8320
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: discovery
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8320
          name: foxden
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 8000m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 100Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/secrets
          name: secrets
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - name: secrets
        secret:
          secretName: foxden-secrets

---

##### FILE: data-init-config-map.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/mongo-data-init-js:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  candidate-init.js: |
    db = db.getSiblingDB('candidate');
    db.createUser({
      user: 'candidate_user',
      pwd: 'candidate_password',
      roles:[
        {
          role: 'readWrite',
          db: 'candidate'
        }
      ]
    });
    db.createCollection('candidate');
    db.candidate.insertMany(
      [
        {
          _id: '1',
          name: 'sam',
          skills: [ 'java', 'spring' ]
        },
        {
          _id: '2',
          name: 'jake',
          skills: [ 'docker' ]
        },
        {
          _id: '3',
          name: 'mike',
          skills: [ 'jira' ]
        }
      ]
    );
  job-init.js: |
    db = db.getSiblingDB('job');
    db.createUser({
      user: "job_user",
      pwd: "job_password",
      roles:[
        {
            role: "readWrite",
            db: "job"
        }
      ]
    });
    db.createCollection('job');
    db.job.insertMany(
      [
        {
          description: "senior java dev",
          company: "amazon",
          skills: [ "java", "spring", "docker" ],
          salary: 100000,
          isRemote: false
        },
        {
          description: "junior java dev",
          company: "apple",
          skills: [ "java" ],
          salary: 50000,
          isRemote: false
        },
        {
          description: "scrum master",
          company: "google",
          skills: [ "agile", "jira" ],
          salary: 60000,
          isRemote: true
        },
        {
          description: "director of engg",
          company: "microsoft",
          skills: [ "java", "jira", "project" ],
          salary: 150000,
          isRemote: true
        }
      ]
    );
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: mongo-data-init-js
  namespace: default

---

##### FILE: data-loader.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/crdb-geo-loader:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: crdb-geo-loader
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - args:
    - curl -s -k ${DATA_1} ${DATA_2} ${DATA_3} ${DATA_4} ${DATA_5} ${DATA_6} | gunzip
      - | ./load_osm_stdin.py
    command:
    - /bin/bash
    - -c
    env:
    - name: DB_URL
      value: postgres://demouser:demopasswd@cockroachdb-public:26257/defaultdb
    - name: DATA_1
      value: https://storage.googleapis.com/crl-goddard-gis/osm_eu_2022.09.01.txt.gz
    - name: DATA_2
      value: https://storage.googleapis.com/crl-goddard-gis/osm_austin_with_ratings_20240126.txt.gz
    - name: DATA_3
      value: https://storage.googleapis.com/crl-goddard-gis/osm_cville_with_ratings_20240208.txt.gz
    - name: DATA_4
      value: https://storage.googleapis.com/crl-goddard-gis/osm_dc_with_ratings_20240208.txt.gz
    - name: DATA_5
      value: https://storage.googleapis.com/crl-goddard-gis/osm_new_york_with_ratings_20240208.txt.gz
    - name: DATA_6
      value: https://storage.googleapis.com/crl-goddard-gis/osm_so_cal_with_ratings_2024.02.09.txt.gz
    image: mgoddard/iam-geo-tourist-x86:1.2
    imagePullPolicy: Always
    name: crdb-geo-loader
  restartPolicy: Never

---

##### FILE: datanode-statefulset.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/datanode:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: datanode
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: datanode
  serviceName: datanode-svc
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: datanode
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /opt/starter.sh
        - hdfs
        - datanode
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: hadoop-conf
        image: apache/hadoop:3.3.6
        name: datanode
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9864
          name: http
        - containerPort: 9866
          name: transfer
        - containerPort: 9867
          name: ipc
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: datanode-pvc
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: datanode-pvc
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 256Mi
      storageClassName: datanode-storage

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: dataplane_ports_validating_admission_policy.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ValidatingAdmissionPolicy/ports.dataplane.gateway-operator.konghq.com:
apiVersion: admissionregistration.k8s.io/v1
kind: ValidatingAdmissionPolicy
metadata:
  name: ports.dataplane.gateway-operator.konghq.com
  namespace: default
spec:
  matchConstraints:
    resourceRules:
    - apiGroups:
      - gateway-operator.konghq.com
      apiVersions:
      - v1beta1
      operations:
      - CREATE
      - UPDATE
      resources:
      - dataplanes
  validations:
  - expression: |
      !has(object.spec.network) ||
      !has(object.spec.network.services) ||
      !has(object.spec.network.services.ingress) ||
      !has(object.spec.network.services.ingress.ports) ||
      !has(variables.proxyContainer.env) ||
      variables.envPortMaps == null ||
      (
        variables.ingressPorts.all(p, variables.envPortMaps.
                  split(",").
                  exists(pm,
                      pm.split(":")[1].trim() == string(p.targetPort)
                      )
                  )
      )
    messageExpression: '''Each port from spec.network.services.ingress.ports has to
      have an accompanying port in KONG_PORT_MAPS env'''
    reason: Invalid
  - expression: |
      !has(object.spec.network) ||
      !has(object.spec.network.services) ||
      !has(object.spec.network.services.ingress) ||
      !has(object.spec.network.services.ingress.ports) ||
      !has(variables.proxyContainer.env) ||
      variables.envProxyListen == null ||
      (
        variables.ingressPorts.all(p, variables.envProxyListen.
                  split(",").
                  exists(pm,
                    pm.trim().split(" ")[0].split(":")[1].trim() == string(p.targetPort)
                    )
                  )
      )
    messageExpression: '''Each port from spec.network.services.ingress.ports has to
      have an accompanying port in KONG_PROXY_LISTEN env'''
    reason: Invalid
  variables:
  - expression: object.spec.network.services.ingress.ports
    name: ingressPorts
  - expression: object.spec.deployment.podTemplateSpec
    name: podTemplateSpec
  - expression: |
      variables.podTemplateSpec.spec.containers.filter(c, c.name == 'proxy')
    name: proxyContainers
  - expression: |
      variables.proxyContainers.size() > 0 ?
        variables.proxyContainers[0] :
        null
    name: proxyContainer
  - expression: |
      variables.proxyContainer.env.filter(e, e.name == "KONG_PORT_MAPS")
    name: envFilteredPortMaps
  - expression: |
      variables.proxyContainer.env.filter(e, e.name == "KONG_PROXY_LISTEN")
    name: envFilteredProxyListen
  - expression: |
      variables.envFilteredPortMaps.size() > 0 ? variables.envFilteredPortMaps[0].value : null
    name: envPortMaps
  - expression: |
      variables.envFilteredProxyListen.size() > 0 ? variables.envFilteredProxyListen[0].value : null
    name: envProxyListen

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

##### FILE: datarepo-statefulset.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to parasoft-ns/StatefulSet/datarepo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    tag: datarepo
  name: datarepo
  namespace: parasoft-ns
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      tag: datarepo
  serviceName: datarepo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        tag: datarepo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          value: admin
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: admin
        image: mongo:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: datarepo
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: datarepo-volume
      volumes:
      - name: datarepo-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: datarepo-pvc

---

kind: Deployment

    kompose.cmd: kompose convert -f docker-compose.yaml
    kompose.version: 1.32.0 (765fde254)
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: data-script
  name: data-script
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: data-script
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert -f docker-compose.yaml
        kompose.version: 1.32.0 (765fde254)
      labels:
        io.kompose.network/app-myapp: "true"
        io.kompose.service: data-script
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: notyouraverageusername/data-script:v1
        name: data-script
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          hostPort: 80
          protocol: TCP
      restartPolicy: Always

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    control-plane: dataset-controller
  name: dataset-controller
  namespace: fluid-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: dataset-controller
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        control-plane: dataset-controller
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --development=true
        command:
        - dataset-controller
        - start
        env: null
        name: manager
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: metrics
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 300Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 200Mi
      serviceAccountName: dataset-controller
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      tolerations:
      - operator: Exists

---

            },

            "name": "prometheus",
            "type": "prometheus",

          }

        app: data-source

      containers:

          value: ORCLPDB1
        - name: ORACLE_PWD

##### FILE: data-tier_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/data-tier:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: microservices
    tier: data
  name: data-tier
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      tier: data
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: microservices
        tier: data
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - redis-server
        - /etc/redis/redis.conf
        image: redis:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: redis
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6379
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/redis
          name: config
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: config
            path: redis.conf
          name: redis-config
        name: config

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to deploy-namespace/Deployment/deploy-namespace-nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    deploy-namespace: nginx
  name: deploy-namespace-nginx
  namespace: deploy-namespace
spec:
  replicas: 4
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 100%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 0%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: container-nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - curl
            - -f
            - http://localhost:80/
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 265Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.3"
            memory: 65Mi
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: 80
          timeoutSeconds: 5

---

##### FILE: db-clarus-deploy.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/clarus-db-deploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: clarus-db-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: clarus-db
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: clarus-db
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-root-password
              name: todoapi-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB
              name: todoapi-configmap
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: USER
              name: todoapi-configmap
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-admin-password
              name: todoapi-secret
        image: mysql:5.7
        name: clarus-db
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: clarus-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: clarus-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: clarus-pv-claim

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/clarus-db-deploy

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/clarus-db-deploy

1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/clarus-db-deploy failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/clarus-db-deploy failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Deployment/clarus-db-deploy failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Deployment/clarus-db-deploy failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

1 - autogen-validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment

  replicas: 1

      app: clarus-db

              key: DB

          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: USER

          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-admin-password
              name: todoapi-secret

    ecomdb;\nGRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON ecomdb.* TO 'hero'@'%!'(MISSING);\nUSE ecomdb;\nCREATE
    TABLE products (id mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment,Name varchar(255)
    default NULL,Price varchar(255) default NULL, ImageUrl varchar(255) default NULL,PRIMARY
    KEY (id)) AUTO_INCREMENT=1;\nINSERT INTO products (Name,Price,ImageUrl) VALUES
    (\"Laptop\",\"100\",\"c-1.png\"),(\"Drone\",\"200\",\"c-2.png\"),(\"VR\",\"300\",\"c-3.png\"),(\"Tablet\",\"50\",\"c-5.png\"),(\"Watch\",\"90\",\"c-6.png\"),(\"Phone
    Covers\",\"20\",\"c-7.png\"),(\"Phone\",\"80\",\"c-8.png\"),(\"Laptop\",\"150\",\"c-4.png\");"

    GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON *.* TO 'ecomuser'@'localhost';
    FLUSH PRIVILEGES;
    USE ecomdb;
    CREATE TABLE products (id mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment,Name varchar(255) default NULL,Price varchar(255) default NULL, ImageUrl varchar(255) default NULL,PRIMARY KEY (id)) AUTO_INCREMENT=1;

##### FILE: db-cronjob.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/CronJob/mongodb-backup-cronjob:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: mongodb-backup-cronjob
  namespace: default
spec:
  concurrencyPolicy: Allow
  failedJobsHistoryLimit: 3
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        metadata:
          annotations:
            cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        spec:
          containers:
          - args:
            - mongodump --host=mongodb-svc.default.svc.cluster.local --port=27017
              --username=admin --password=test123 --out=/usr/share/mongodump/$(date
              +"%!d(MISSING)%!m(MISSING)%!Y(MISSING)-%!H(MISSING)%!M(MISSING)%!S(MISSING)")
            command:
            - /bin/sh
            - -c
            env:
            - name: MONGO_PASSWORD
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  key: mongodb-root-pass
                  name: mongodb-sec
            - name: MONGO_UNAME
              valueFrom:
                configMapKeyRef:
                  key: mongodb-root-uname
                  name: mongodb-cm
            image: mongo
            name: mongodb
            volumeMounts:
            - mountPath: /usr/share/mongodump/
              name: mongodump
          restartPolicy: Never
          volumes:
          - hostPath:
              path: /data/unique/
              type: Directory
            name: mongodump
      ttlSecondsAfterFinished: 60
  schedule: '* * * * *'
  successfulJobsHistoryLimit: 2

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/CronJob/mongodb-backup-cronjob
policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/CronJob/mongodb-backup-cronjob failed:
1 - autogen-cronjob-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-cronjob-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/CronJob/mongodb-backup-cronjob failed:
1 - autogen-cronjob-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/CronJob/mongodb-backup-cronjob failed:
1 - autogen-cronjob-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/CronJob/mongodb-backup-cronjob failed:
1 - autogen-cronjob-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-cronjob-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/jobTemplate/spec/template/metadata/labels/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/CronJob/mongodb-backup-cronjob failed:
1 - autogen-cronjob-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-cronjob-validate-resources failed at path /spec/jobTemplate/spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/CronJob/mongodb-backup-cronjob failed:
1 - autogen-cronjob-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-cronjob-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/jobTemplate/spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource default/CronJob/mongodb-backup-cronjob failed:
1 - autogen-cronjob-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-cronjob-validate-registries failed at path /spec/jobTemplate/spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/


pass: 7, fail: 7, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 2 

##### FILE: db-cronjob1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to database/CronJob/mongodb-backup-cronjob:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: mongodb-backup-cronjob
  namespace: database
spec:
  concurrencyPolicy: Forbid
  failedJobsHistoryLimit: 3
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        metadata:
          annotations:
            cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        spec:
          containers:
          - args:
            - mongodump --host=mongodb-svc.database.svc.cluster.local --port=27017
              --username=admin --password=test123 --out=/usr/share/mongodump/$(date
              +"%!d(MISSING)%!m(MISSING)%!Y(MISSING)-%!H(MISSING)%!M(MISSING)%!S(MISSING)")
            command:
            - /bin/sh
            - -c
            env:
            - name: MONGO_PASSWORD
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  key: mongodb-root-pass
                  name: mongodb-sec
            - name: MONGO_UNAME
              valueFrom:
                configMapKeyRef:
                  key: mongodb-root-uname
                  name: mongodb-cm
            image: mongo
            name: mongodb
            volumeMounts:
            - mountPath: /usr/share/mongodump/
              name: mongodump
          restartPolicy: Never
          volumes:
          - hostPath:
              path: /data/unique/
              type: Directory
            name: mongodump
      ttlSecondsAfterFinished: 60
  schedule: '* * * * *'
  successfulJobsHistoryLimit: 2

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: db-dep.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/vprodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: vprodb
  name: vprodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: vprodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: vprodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: db-pass
              name: app-secret
        image: vprofile/vprofiledb
        name: vprodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: vprodb-port
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: vpro-db-data
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - rm
        - -rf
        - /var/lib/mysql/lost+found
        image: busybox:latest
        name: busybox
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: vpro-db-data
      nodeSelector:
        zone: us-east-1a
      volumes:
      - awsElasticBlockStore:
          fsType: ext4
          volumeID: MentiondVoumeID
        name: vpro-db-data

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/db:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: db
  name: db
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: db
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: db
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: db-pass
        image: bmajczak/demo-db:V1
        name: db01
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: db-port
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: db-data
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - rm
        - -rf
        - /var/lib/mysql/lost+found
        image: busybox:latest
        name: busybox
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: db-data
      nodeSelector:
        zone: us-west-1c
      volumes:
      - awsElasticBlockStore:
          fsType: ext4
          volumeID: vol-0ed21ed5cd170e870
        name: db-data

##### FILE: db-dep2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/app-dep:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: vprodb
  name: app-dep
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: vprodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: vprodb
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchLabels:
                app: vprodb
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: dbpass
              name: my-app-secrets
        image: csag095/vprofiledb:latest
        name: vprodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: vprodb-port
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: vprodb-data
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: vprodb-data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 10Gi
      storageClassName: vpro-sc

---

##### FILE: db-deploy10.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/postgres-deploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: demo-voting-app
    name: postgres-deploy
  name: postgres-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: demo-voting-app
      name: postgres-deploy
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: postgres-deploy
      name: postgres-deploy
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: postgres
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: postgres-deploy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
          protocol: TCP
      restartPolicy: Always

---

##### FILE: db-deploy2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/database-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: database
  name: database-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: database
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: database
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
              name: db-secret
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_USER
              name: db-secret
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_PASSWORD
              name: db-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_DB
              name: db-configmap
        image: mateusz1982/kubernetes_demo:db_image
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: db-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306

---

##### FILE: db-deploy3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/db-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: db-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mssql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mssql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ACCEPT_EULA
          value: true
        - name: SA_PASSWORD
          value: '@Aa123456789'
        image: mcr.microsoft.com/mssql/server:2017-CU20-ubuntu-16.04
        name: mssql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 1433
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "2"
            memory: 3Gi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.5"
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/opt/mssql
          name: mssql-persistent-storage
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - name: mssql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mssql-pvc

---

          name: db-store
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /data
        name: db-store

metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    app: db-deploy
  name: db-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: db-deploy
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        app: db-deploy
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - json-server --watch db.json --port 8000 --host 0.0.0.0 & json-server --watch
          db2.json --port 8001 --host 0.0.0.0 & json-server --watch db3.json --port
          8002 --host 0.0.0.0
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        image: devarsh10/ocean-json:0.1
        name: ocean-json
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        resources: {}
status: {}

---

##### FILE: db-deployment1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql
  name: mysql-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_PASSWORD
              name: mysql-secrets
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
              name: mysql-secrets
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_DATABASE
              name: mysql-secrets
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_USER
              name: mysql-secrets
        image: mysql:5.7
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
          name: mysql-initdb
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: database-pvc
          subPath: mysql
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: mysql-initdb-config
        name: mysql-initdb
      - name: database-pvc
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: database-pvc

---

##### FILE: db-deployment13.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: dbName
              name: db-config
        image: mongo:4.0.8
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
          name: mongo
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

---

##### FILE: db-deployment16.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: mysql-secret
        - configMapRef:
            name: mysql-config
        image: mysql:5.7
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql

##### FILE: db-deployment19.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/db:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert
    kompose.version: 1.32.0 (HEAD)
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: db
  name: db
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: db
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert
        kompose.version: 1.32.0 (HEAD)
      labels:
        io.kompose.network/myproject-network: "true"
        io.kompose.service: db
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: CELERY_BROKER_URL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: CELERY_BROKER_URL
              name: env
        - name: DB_URI
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_URI
              name: env
        - name: DB_URI_ALEMBIC
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_URI_ALEMBIC
              name: env
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_DB
              name: env
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
              name: env
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_USER
              name: env
        image: postgres:14
        name: db
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: db-data
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/init-db.sql
          name: db-claim1
        - mountPath: /app/.env
          name: db-claim2
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: db-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: db-data
      - name: db-claim1
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: db-claim1
      - name: db-claim2
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: db-claim2

---

  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert -c -o chart
    kompose.version: 1.29.0 (b6b708b6)
    kompose.volume.size: 10G
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: db
  name: db
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: db
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert -c -o chart
        kompose.version: 1.29.0 (b6b708b6)
        kompose.volume.size: 10G
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        io.kompose.network/pixelfed-internal: "true"
        io.kompose.service: db
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --default-authentication-plugin=mysql_native_password
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: pixelfed-env
        image: mariadb:jammy
        name: db
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          hostPort: 3306
          protocol: TCP
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: db-data
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: db-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: db-data
status: {}

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to sql/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql
    tier: database
  name: mysql
  namespace: sql
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
      tier: database
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
        tier: database
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-secrets
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: dbName
              name: db-config
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mysql-secrets
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-secrets
        image: mysql:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

##### FILE: db-deployment23.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/db:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: db
  name: db
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: db
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: db
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - hello
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          value: postgres
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          value: postgres
        image: postgres:15-alpine
        name: postgres
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
          name: postgres
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: db-data
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: db-data

---

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: db
  name: db
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: db
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        io.kompose.service: db
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_ENGINE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_ENGINE
              name: backend-backend--env
        - name: DB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_HOST
              name: backend-backend--env
        - name: DB_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_PORT
              name: backend-backend--env
        - name: DEBUG
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DEBUG
              name: backend-backend--env
        - name: DJANGO_ALLOWED_HOSTS
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DJANGO_ALLOWED_HOSTS
              name: backend-backend--env
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_DB
              name: backend-backend--env
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
              name: backend-backend--env
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_USER
              name: backend-backend--env
        - name: SECRET_KEY
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: SECRET_KEY
              name: backend-backend--env
        image: postgres:12.0-alpine
        name: tictactoe-db
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data/
          name: postgres-data
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: postgres-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: postgres-data
status: {}

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: roar-db
    name: mysql
  name: mysql
  namespace: roar
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: roar-db
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: roar-db
        name: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: mysql.database
              name: mysql-configmap
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysqlpassword
              name: mysqlsecret
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysqlrootpassword
              name: mysqlsecret
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: mysql.user
              name: mysql-configmap
        image: quay.io/bclaster/roar-db:1.0.2
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql

##### FILE: db-deployment3_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql
    tier: database
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
      tier: database
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
        tier: database
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --ignore-db-dir=lost+found
        env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: toor
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: huseyin_aydin_db
        image: mysql:5.7
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/db:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: db
  name: db
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: db
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: db
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: nextcloud
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          value: Adcvn12e2145@
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: nextcloud
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: Adcvn12e2145@
        image: mariadb
        name: db
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: db
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /home/ubuntu/nextcloud/db-pv
        name: db

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/db-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: todoapp
  name: db-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: todoapp
        name: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo:5.0
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: database-persistent-volume-claim

##### FILE: db-deployment35_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql
    tier: database
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
      tier: database
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
        tier: database
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --ignore-db-dir=lost+found
        env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: root
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: singamlabs
        image: mysql:5.7
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

---

  replicas: 1

    matchLabels:
      app: mysql-container
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql-container
        tier: backend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: thisisatestthing.
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: GiftcardSiteDB
        image: nyuappsec/assign3-db:v0
        name: mysql-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-volume-mount
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-volume-mount
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pvc

##### FILE: db-deployment37.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/db:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: db
  name: db
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: db
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: db
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          value: postgres
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          value: postgres
        image: postgres:15-alpine
        name: postgres
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
          name: postgres
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: db-data
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: db-data

---

##### FILE: db-deployment39.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/db-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: db-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: benchmark-db
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: benchmark-db
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - wal_level=logical
        - -c
        - max_connections=500
        - -p
        - "5433"
        env:
        - name: PGDATA
          value: /var/lib/postgresql/data/pgdata
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          value: test
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: db-secret
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: db-secret
        image: postgres:12-alpine
        name: chat-db
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5433
          hostPort: 5433
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: benchmark-vol
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: benchmark-vol
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: benchmark-pvc

---

##### FILE: db-deployment4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql
  name: mysql-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_PASSWORD
              name: mysql-secrets
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
              name: mysql-secrets
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_DATABASE
              name: mysql-secrets
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_USER
              name: mysql-secrets
        image: mysql:5.7
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
          name: mysql-initdb
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: database-pvc
          subPath: mysql
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: mysql-initdb-config
        name: mysql-initdb
      - name: database-pvc
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: database-pvc

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

          valueFrom:

              key: POSTGRES_DB
              name: db-secret

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/db:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    name: db
  name: db
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: db
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: db
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_DB
              name: db-config
        - name: POSTGRES_HOST_AUTH_METHOD
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_HOST_AUTH_METHOD
              name: db-config
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
              name: db-secret
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_USER
              name: db-config
        image: postgres:12.0-alpine
        name: db
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
          protocol: TCP
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: postgres-data
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: postgres-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: postgres-data
status: {}

  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: db
  name: db
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: db
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert
        kompose.version: 1.26.0 (40646f47)
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        io.kompose.service: db
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: exampledb
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          value: examplepass
        - name: MYSQL_RANDOM_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: "1"
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: exampleuser
        image: mysql:8.1
        name: db
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: db
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: db
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: db
status: {}

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/db-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: db-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ecom-app
      tier: db
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: ecom-app
        tier: db
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: mysql_db
              name: mariadb-config
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: mysql_user
              name: mariadb-config
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql_password
              name: mariadb-secret
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql_root_password
              name: mariadb-secret
        image: mariadb
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /bin/bash
              - -c
              - sleep 20
        name: mariadb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: http
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
          name: mariadb-initdb
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: initdb
        name: mariadb-initdb
      - name: mariadb-pv-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mariadb-pvc

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/db:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert -c -o chart
    kompose.version: 1.29.0 (b6b708b6)
    kompose.volume.size: 10G
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: db
  name: db
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: db
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert -c -o chart
        kompose.version: 1.29.0 (b6b708b6)
        kompose.volume.size: 10G
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        io.kompose.network/pixelfed-internal: "true"
        io.kompose.service: db
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --default-authentication-plugin=mysql_native_password
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: pixelfed-env
        image: mariadb:jammy
        name: db
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          hostPort: 3306
          protocol: TCP
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: db-data
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: db-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: db-data
status: {}

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/db:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: db
  name: db
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: db
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: db
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          value: postgres
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          value: postgres
        image: postgres:15-alpine
        name: postgres
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
          name: postgres
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: db-data
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: db-data

##### FILE: db-deployment54_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to <ns>/Deployment/db:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    app: db
    rengine: postgres
  name: db
  namespace: <ns>
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: db
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        app: rengine-postgres-db
        rengine: postgres
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: false
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_DATABASE
          value: rengine
        - name: POSTGRES_PORT
          value: "5432"
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: rengine_postgres_password
              name: rengine-secrets
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          value: rengine
        - name: PGDATA
          value: /var/lib/postgresql/data/pgdata
        image: postgres:16.2
        imagePullPolicy: ""
        name: db
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: rengine-postgres-db-pv
      restartPolicy: Always
      serviceAccountName: ""
      volumes:
      - name: rengine-postgres-db-pv
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: rengine-postgres-db-pv
status: {}

---

##### FILE: db-deploy-student.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/studentdb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: studentdb
  name: studentdb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: studentdb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: studentdb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: mongodb-root-uname
              name: mongodb-cm
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongodb-root-pass
              name: mongodb-sec
        image: mongo
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - mongosh
            - --eval
            - db.adminCommand('ping')
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: db
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - mongosh
            - --eval
            - db.adminCommand('ping')
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 2
            memory: 2Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 1
            memory: 1Gi
        startupProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - mongosh
            - --eval
            - db.adminCommand('ping')
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: data-store
      volumes:
      - name: data-store
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-data-claim

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: studentdb
  name: studentdb
  namespace: database
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: studentdb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: studentdb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: mongodb-root-uname
              name: mongodb-cm
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongodb-root-pass
              name: mongodb-sec
        image: mongo
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - mongosh
            - --eval
            - db.adminCommand('ping')
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: db
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - mongosh
            - --eval
            - db.adminCommand('ping')
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 2
            memory: 2Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 1
            memory: 1Gi
        startupProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - mongosh
            - --eval
            - db.adminCommand('ping')
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: data-store
      volumes:
      - name: data-store
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-data-claim

##### FILE: db-deploy-WIN.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/database-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: database
  name: database-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: database
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: database
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
              name: db-secret
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_USER
              name: db-secret
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_PASSWORD
              name: db-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_DB
              name: db-configmap
        image: krzysztofkalita/kubernetes_demo_app:db_image
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: db-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306

---
